resources.string: Please make sure the camera 4G flow card balance is enough
No gateway is bound yet, please bind a gateway and retry
Click below button to add your first remote controller
Please empty code library or delete unnecessary remote controllers to release memory
Please check model on remote controller or in user manual, and matched code library download is recommended.
Aim IR transmitter at the electrical appliance to be matched
Click "test button" and see whether any response from electrical appliance
Click "Responding" or "Non-response" to change test button until match successfully
Downloading code library to device now, it may take about 2 minutes. Please do not use other functions during downloading.
When red light inside IR transmitter is on, aim remote controller at IR transmitter\'s black signal receiving area, and quickly click once the button to be learnt
Please check whether IR transmitter\'s memory is full, or whether it is located within effective communication distance from gateway
Please make sure IR transmitter is located within effective communication distance from gateway, and aim remote controller at black signal receiving area
Confirm to empty all code library in IR transmitter?
Downloading code library to device now, it may take 1 minute or so, please wait patiently and not use other functions during this time
Failed to get the code library list
Failed to get the code library
Point the infrared transponder to the device to match.
Click on the button to see if the air conditioner is responding.
It is recommended to try several keystrokes, select a high match remote control, and then click OK to use.
LAN can not add the remote control, please use the mobile phone number registered landing.
The current model does not support the matching code Library Download
The maximum amount of 20 remote controls has been reached
There is no infrared code for this button
The key code for the learning is full
You are using phone data for viewing\n the video is about[font]6M[/font]
Configuring Network for gateway configuration for the first time
The gateway is connected to the power supply, waiting for the indicator to be lighted, and the gateway distribution network mode is selected.
Connect to the gateway through the network, wait for the SYS indicator, and click "next step"
Select operation according to the equipment indicator light:\nConnection successful: SYS indicator flashing light often\nConnection failure: SYS indicator flashes slowly after flash
Please set up according to the requirements of luminaire specification
Camera has no SD card, no playback record!
You haven\'t bound lock for camera yet
The lock is not in current gateway, can not unlock
Reading video fails, please try again
No video during selected period of time
Unlocking by password on play page is available after bind lock
After unbinding, the other lock can be bound
Formatting will clear all video data on SD card!
One button to arm security devices, and start mind-the-house mode
After turn on security protection, camera will guard your house safety. Once detecting abnormality, it will inform you immediately
Camera protection will be all-day on
Camera protection will be on during 8am to 8pm
Camera protection will be on during 8pm to next day 8am
Turn on protection only during workdays
Press screen to drag and set protection area. Drag four corners to change protection area\'s dimension; press area and drag it to change protection area\'s location.
Connect camera to network only with several simple steps and then you can check home anytime and anywhere
The device has been bound by other account
Connect camera to power and wait for camera [font]indicator light turning on[/font], then click "next step"
Please put camera as close as possible to router

Choose a WiFi with strong signal, and keep Door Guardian under the same WiFi with smart phone while keep it at a proper distance from router. Then enter WiFi password to access network quickly.
Below items may lead to a network connection failure:
1. Check whether enabled anti WiFi-stealing function (black-and-white list, MAC address filter, etc.) which may lead to connection failure. You can disable it temporarily to connect the device to network first and then restore to previous settings. 
2. The device doesn't support 5G WiFi. Please open your router administrative webpage (whose address is normally printed on a label sticking on router's bottom) and enable 2.4G in wireless setting. 
3. A bridging WiFi may cause instable network. A non-bridging WiFi is highly recommended if you're using a bridging one.

More solutions
Choose a WiFi with strong signal, and keep Door Guardian under the same WiFi with smart phone while keep it at a proper distance from router. Then enter WiFi password to access network quickly.
Below items may lead to a network connection failure:
1. Make sure WiFi account and password are entered correctly. 
It's highly possible that your incorrect WiFi account or password entering for Door Guardian leads to failed connection. Pay attention to whether there is entering of Space, and try to avoid using complicated and uncommon symbols. 
2. Check whether there is connection failure caused by router setting.
（1）Check whether enabled anti WiFi-stealing function (black-and-white list, MAC address filter, etc.) which may lead to connection failure. You can disable it and then try to connect again. 
（2）The device doesn't support 5G WiFi. Please open your router administrative webpage (whose address is normally printed on a label sticking on router's bottom) and enable 2.4G in wireless setting. 
（3）A bridging WiFi may cause instable network. A non-bridging WiFi is highly recommended if you're using a bridging one.

1. Please dim up screen to the brightest, and turn off screen saver and screen auto lock;\n2. Do not scan under direct sunlight and strong light;\n3. Please lightly wipe the lens with Lens wiping cloth.
Quickly click [font]SET[/font] key twice\nSee whether hear a prompt tone of [font]"beep"[/font]
Check and view camera in device list
Put QR code on back of gateway into the frame
The device is recognized as camera gateway, whether to set network for it?
The camera has been bound by other account
You can continue to bind gateway
The camera is in your device list already
After check, the camera can be found in APP device list
Setting network for camera gateway now, please wait…
Setting network for camera now, please wait…

SD card can not be recognized
The file can not be found

Fail to obtain wireless network name, please enable location service first
This account is not bound or shared with the doorlock
When the indicator light is on or the broadcast camera is online, click next step.
Welcome to use mini gateway \nFor first use, WiFi configuration for gateway is recommended
Connect to power and wait about 40s for device to start, click next step after hearing welcome prompt tone
Please connect gateway\'s WiFi\nReturn to smart home APP after connection is done

1、make sure gateway has started successfully;
2、make sure phone is within gateway's WiFi range
3、Check whether gateway's WiFi name is modified
4、Cut power and restart gateway to try again
5、Long press on set key for 10s to restore factory settings

Synchronize WiFi name and password to gateway

Cameras and mobile phones under the same network connection

The default password rules:
1.Starting with ME, CG gateway ID number, the default password for the 6 to 11, a total of six;
 2.Other gateway ID number, the default password for subsequent six.
 note: Gateway ID see in or on the back of the equipment base
Under unlocked condition, press "Cold storage" key for 3 seconds, it will beep once, and the network indicator on the display will blink, then it enters WiFi configuration mode.
The product is a non-controllable device
When device is a little distant from gateway but can be added into gateway with weak singal, a repeater can be installed between them to strenthen signal

When device is too distant from gateway and can not be added into gateway, a reapter can be installed between them. Adding repeater into gateway first, and adding device into repeater, then devices can communicate with each other
How to add other devices into repeater?
Quick click on multifunction key 6 times, system indicator light flickers 1 time, and devices are allowed to join in repeater. Allow time lasts for 4 minutes.
The device is detected as Lookever camera which includes both gateway and camera function, please select adding type
Can not recognize the device ID
Hold and drag the icon on the right side, it can be sort of scene, the first eight scene will show on the front page; Click the icon in the upper right corner to group the scene for management
Shared gateway does not have this permission
No housekeeper task created yet, click "+" on top right conner to create
Talking to ding dong, smart home freely control, open your smart life
Voice command format: ding-dong ding-dong, "/ tell/please let" %1$s "open/close" "device name"
White childe has received the following permissions
Determine to cancel the authorization login?
White childe will receive the following permissions after login
Let White childe scan Qr code in mobile phone, scanning with small white robot after successful login name.
App requires your consent to access FaceID. If not allowed, you will not be able to use the FaceID unlock function.
The door lock will be opened, please pay attention to safety

1. Please unplug camera's power and then replug, making sure power line port and data line port both be pluged well；


2. Make sure WiFi setting key be clicked properly with special tool, and try one more time with same method； 


3. Other problems, you can contact us with below method：

 Service hotline：400-928-9228

Choose a WiFi with strong signal, and keep Door Guardian under the same WiFi with smart phone while keep it at a proper distance from router. Then enter WiFi password to access network. Below problems may lead to connection failure： 

1. make sure WiFi account and password are entered correctly. It's highly possible that your incorrect WiFi account or password entering for Door Guardian leads to failed connection. Pay attention to whether there is entering of Space, and try to avoid using complicated and uncommon symbols. 

2. Check whether there is connection failure caused by router setting. 

（1）Check whether enabled anti WiFi-stealing function (black-and-white list, MAC address filter, etc.) which may lead to connection failure. Disable it and then try to connect again. 

（2）The device doesn't support 5G WiFi. Please open your router administrative webpage (whose address is normally printed on a label sticking on router's bottom) and enable 2.4G in wireless setting. 

（3）A bridging WiFi may cause instable network. A non-bridging WiFi is highly recommended if you're using a bridging one.
to see whether hear a prompt tone of[font] "wait for connection"[/font]

at a distance of 10-20 cm to scan

How to connect the device to network quickly?

Choose a WiFi with strong signal, and keep Door Guardian under the same WiFi with smart phone while keep it at a proper distance from router. Then enter WiFi password to access network quickly.
Below items may lead to a network connection failure:
1. Check whether enabled anti WiFi-stealing function (black-and-white list, MAC address filter, etc.) which may lead to connection failure. You can disable it temporarily to connect the device to network first and then restore to previous settings. 
2. The device doesn't support 5G WiFi. Please open your router administrative webpage (whose address is normally printed on a label sticking on router's bottom) and enable 2.4G in wireless setting. 
3. A bridging WiFi may cause instable network. A non-bridging WiFi is highly recommended if you're using a bridging one.
1. Open Ding-dong mini device, select "scan QR code" in "system setting" menu to scan
2. Scan QR code on screen by Ding-dong mini\'s lens
3. Click next step after hearing a "beep"

Choose a WiFi with strong signal, and keep Door Guardian under the same WiFi with smart phone while keep it at a proper distance from router. Then enter WiFi password to access network quickly.
Below items may lead to a network connection failure:
1. Make sure WiFi account and password are entered correctly. 
It's highly possible that your incorrect WiFi account or password entering for Door Guardian leads to failed connection. Pay attention to whether there is entering of Space, and try to avoid using complicated and uncommon symbols. 
2. Check whether there is connection failure caused by router setting.
（1）Check whether enabled anti WiFi-stealing function (black-and-white list, MAC address filter, etc.) which may lead to connection failure. You can disable it and then try to connect again. 
（2）The device doesn't support 5G WiFi. Please open your router administrative webpage (whose address is normally printed on a label sticking on router's bottom) and enable 2.4G in wireless setting. 
（3）A bridging WiFi may cause instable network. A non-bridging WiFi is highly recommended if you're using a bridging one.

After turning-on, when power on again after blackout, device will restore to status prior to power cutoff; After turning-off, when power on again after blackout, device will be off status
Binding/Unbinding mode is enabled, please conduct below operations:
1. Please long press SET key on binding switch within 20S, at the same time, click the key which needs to bind/unbind once, then loose SET key.
2. If indicator light on binding switch flashes 3 times, binding/unbinding succeeds, if flashes 6 times, binding/unbinding fails.

1.The remote button is not pointed at IR transmitter, causing the receiver to be inexact, can try again,click on the "match"
2.The corresponding remote control is not found in the code base. Click "custom" to customize the remote control

Start a match to the air conditioner, and if the air conditioner opens, it\'s a match, and click "sure" to download the remote
2.The remote distance is better in 2 meters when match, Be sure to point the remote head of the key to the remote device

3.Click the right and left to match one by one. Never click the start key to observe whether the power source of the air conditioner is opened. If the air conditioner is remotely opened, it indicates that the match is successful. Click ok to end the match.

With the development of the lighting industry, more and more new lighting fixtures appear on the market, and only the selection of a suitable dimmer can ensure the dimming effect of the lighting system.

Generally speaking, for lamps with capacitive load such as LED, select the trailing edge dimming; if it is an inductive load lamp that is illuminated by gas, such as fluorescent lamp, high pressure sodium lamp, mercury lamp, metal halide lamp, etc., select the front edge. Dimming; if it is a purely resistive load such as an incandescent lamp, both front and rear dimming can be used.

Please enter the serial number on the device label
To enhance security, please set your device password
A combination of 8-32 digits of numbers, letters and symbols(Case sensetive)

Device password is a security strength strategy aimed to better protect the security of your device. The audio and video information of the device only could be accessed when using correct device password.

When you connect camera to a device such as NVR, you need to manually enter the password. Please keep it. If you forget, you can restore the device to factory settings and add it again to set new password.
The device password is what you set when you first time configured camera. If you forget, please restore the device to factory settings and add it again to set new password（Press RESET button 10s）
Your device has been registered on the platform for more than 3 days. Please try again after powering off and restarting it.

Enables inspection,taking shots and videoing functions of device
Different type NVR device is with different adding methods, please selecting proper way according to real sitution.
1.POE connection:After network hard disk video recorder and IPC powering on,IPC will get connected with corresponding channel
2.Wired connection:Power on the network hard disk and follow instructions to pair with IPC
3.Wireless connection:Network hard disk video recorder and IPC get paired with no need of configuring after powering on

The gateway is a device in the ZigBee smart home system that connects various devices such as door locks, switches, sockets, curtains, etc., so that they can cooperate with each other and linkage. The user can send commands to the device remotely through the gateway, and the gateway can also pass the scene. Or the housekeeper automatically controls the equipment to meet the diverse needs of the users. It can be said that the gateway is the brain of the smart home.
Gateway network connection can be set into wireless relay connection

A simple and clear style gives a brand new feeling, a more user-friendly design brings a comfortable experience
The third party login funciton is added to access APP quickly
Adding shortcut on home page to check information and control devices more conveniently

User can customize multiple scene modes. With only one click, many devices will be controlled at a time. From now on, say goodbye to complicated operation mode of switching on/off one device by one device.
There is linkage relation between smart home devices. User can make free combination of different devices based on own needs and build a personalized smart home system.
Set various timing funcitons according to your daily routine. Meet customer\'s need of timing switch. Powerful funciton and simple operation, makes your daily life more organized.
Up to 32 devices can be added to the Lite Gateway
